sentences.sContent: We’re having difficulty recruiting enough qualified staff.
sentences.sCn: 我们难以招聘到足够的合格职员。

sentences.sContent: Many government officials were recruited from private industry.
sentences.sCn: 很多政府官员是从私营企业招募来的。

synos.tran: 补充；聘用；征募；使…恢复健康
复原；征募新兵；得到补充；恢复健康

remMethod.val: re + cruit(=cres成长) → 使成长壮大 → 招募(新兵)， 招收(新成员)

trans.tranOther: to find new people to work in a company, join an organization, do a job etc
